calc package¶

Implements and automates quantum-chemical calculations.

Subpackages¶

  • calc.saver package
  • calc.util package

Submodules¶

calc.graph module¶

Implements nested directed graphs. Like folders, they organize DFT computations.

class calc.graph.Graph(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: calc.graph.Node, calc.util.Graph

Implements a nested directed graph \(\subset\) state.root.

Is-a Node. Is-a util.Graph Has-a few more tricks up its sleeve.

iter()¶
Returns:generator that recursively iterates through self
parent¶
Returns:first parent Node or None if nonexistent
prev¶
Returns:first prev Node or None if nonexistent
class calc.graph.Node(name, x=None, y=None)¶

Implements a generic node in a nested directed graph.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – Node’s name. ‘/’ will be silently replaced with ‘|’, to facilitate id.
  • x (float) – x coordinate. None to use random number
  • y (float) – y coordinate
name = None¶

str: Node’s name.

x = None¶

float in (-100, 100). x coordinate when drawn in 2D by Ogma.js

y = None¶

float in (-100, 100). y coordinate
